title: Textile, ca. 1963
description: Brilliant pink material, double cloth, warp printed in large scale pattern derived from an Indian shawl design, in strong greens, red, and purple. The reverse is a strong magenta, with small-scale pattern, part of larger design on face, appearing in reverse colors on face.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1963.
ca. 1963. Medium: silk
Technique: double cloth. Gift of Mrs. Irwin Hersey. 1966-41-1.
